tool_description: The simplest way to involve your teams to share company brand content
title: Gigopost

api_list.name: Get org info
api_list.description: Gives organization information related to the dashboard counts

api_list.name: Get All Orgs
api_list.description: Use this API to get your Organization IDs. Each org can have its own Social Media channels.

api_list.name: Get API Key
api_list.description: This will simply send you email with instruction. Complete signup process and then access url https://gigopost.com/dev_api to get the api key.

api_list.name: Post image
api_list.description:
Post image to connected social media. 
Configure social media connections with O auth with https://gigopost.com
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://gigopost.p.rapidapi.com/post_image/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "gigopost.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://gigopost.p.rapidapi.com/post_image/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "gigopost.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://gigopost.p.rapidapi.com/post_image/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "gigopost.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
